book.synopsis: From its colonization to the Los Angeles riots, this book recounts the history of America from a multicultural point of view, while detailing the involvements and achievements of the non-Anglo participants who helped create it. Reprint.
book.title_long: A Different Mirror: A History of Multicultural America
book.dimensions: Height: 8.25 Inches, Length: 5.5 Inches, Weight: 1.2 Pounds, Width: 1.5 Inches
